 2015-02552015-02-26,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LINDY LEDOHOWSKI of Ottawa, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective March 15, 2015.
